channel.title: Search trends on Simo Ahava's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Search trends on Simo Ahava's blog

item.title: Search Trends And What They Reveal
item.description: I’m hooked on Google Trends. For example, it probably won’t astound you to learn that whenever search trends peak for flu symptoms, there’s a similar peak for vaccine. (See also how at some points vaccine comes first and only then do flu symptoms arise. Conspiracy theorists, the ball is in your court!) Probing this particular case further, I looked at the search trends for swine flu and vaccine.
